price: 29. Kaadu yi-Rabbow doynikik saay- leeh barkat-le obtimih yoo oobis, Atu aracal oobissi haytaamak kayrih yayse Rabbi kinnitok ixxic.
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلۡنِي مُنزَلٗا مُّبَارَكٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمُنزِلِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi anzil'nī munzalan mubārakan wa-anta khayru al-munzilīna
